message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a unique product with immense potential. While I can't disclose all the details, its value to me is at least $1200000.  I'm confident this product will be a significant asset for the right buyer.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This represents a significant opportunity for you, as I have a back-up buyer who is willing to pay $1200000.  Please consider this offer carefully, as it's a chance to acquire a truly valuable asset.
